info.title: Longdo Map REST API documentation
info.description: The Longdo Map REST API offers comprehensive GIS APIs and data solutions, including place suggestions and searches, geocoding and reverse geocoding, address extraction, route planning, coverage area calculation, and more. You can obtain a free Longdo Map API Key to get started.

externalDocs.description: Find out more about Longdo Map REST API

parameters.name: forcelimit
parameters.description: Minimum numbers of result from the Search that will not trigger next step of SmartSearch unless the 'forcesmartsearch' is set to 1 (Default: 1)

parameters.name: extendedlimit
parameters.description: If the 'extendedsearch' is set to 1, this parameter is a minimum of longdo smart search results before using extended search (Default: 3)

parameters.name: extendedkey
parameters.description: Extended API Key

parameters.name: exceedtime
parameters.description: Limit time. If exceed, do only raw search. 0 = not use exceed time (Default: 0)

parameters.name: cache
parameters.description: If equal to 1, enable cache (Default: 0)

parameters.name: extractaddress
parameters.description: If set to 1, response an extracted address object (Default: 0)

lon.description: Location of search parameter if specified

lat.description: Location of search parameter if specified

distance.description: Distance from center in the same unit of span, if span is provided

source.description: Map data source of search result, e.g., longdo, OSM

parameters.description: JSONP Callback function (Default: Response in JSON)

dir.description: Direction related to road geometry (forward / reverse)

meta.description: Error code and message if no data found at the request location

cost.description:
Cost (Default: false)
  • true = time_step and distance_step details will be included
  • false = Only the optimal path without additional information will be returned

otsp.description:
Is Open Loop TSP (Default: false )
  • true = Return to start/first point
  • false = Do not return to start/first point

mode.description:
Search mode
Available valueDescription
t (default)Fastest route and avoid traffic congestions, with the real-time or predicted traffic condition (if time is specified)
cFastest route (disregarding traffic condition), return static travel time
dShortest route, return static travel time
eShortest route, return travel time with traffic condition

status.description: HTTP status code indicating the success or failure of the request

otsp.description: Indicating whether the route is an Open Loop TSP (OTSP) "0" = Do not return to start/first point, "1" = Return to start/first point

mode.description:
Route search mode
Available valueDescription
t (default)Fastest route and avoid traffic congestions, with the real-time or predicted traffic condition (if time is specified)
cFastest route (disregarding traffic condition), return static travel time
dShortest route, return static travel time
eShortest route, return travel time with traffic condition

body.description: Contains detailed information about the route

sequence.description: Ordered list of indices representing the sequence in which locations should be visited. The sequence is circular, ending where it began

location.description: Array of objects, each containing latitude (lat) and longitude (lon) of a specific location

total_distance.description: Total distance of the optimal route

total_time.description: Total time required to traverse the optimal route

parameters.description: (Route number)

parameters.description: Area (GeoJSON string)

parameters.name: wkt
parameters.description: 1,000 ..  Well Known Text format (Bound of Area in Well Known Text format - The area must be less than 1,000 km)

parameters.name: year
parameters.description: ..   2020 (Data year - Default value: 2020)

turn.description:
Turn instruction
TurnCode valueDescription
0Turn left
1Turn right
2Turn slight left
3Turn slight right
4Unknown direction
5Go straight
6Enter tollway
9Arrive
11Travel by ferry

forceSmartSearch.name: forcesmartsearch
forceSmartSearch.description:
Flag to indicate whether to perform SmartSearch function
Available valueDescription
0 (default)Only when there are few results: only perform SmartSearch if the results from Search are fewer than the 'forcelimit'.
1Always: always perform SmartSearch function (might result in more transactions) to get as many results as possible according to the given 'limit' parameter.

extendedSearch.name: extendedsearch
extendedSearch.description:
Perform extended search functions from external services `(extra fee might apply)`
Available valueDescription
0 (default)No extended search: do not perform any extended search. Return only Longdo Map search results.
1Only when there are results: perform extended search only in case there are fewer results from Longdo Map search than the 'extendedlimit'.
2Always: always perform extended search together with the Longdo Map search.
3Extended only: perform and return only extended search results without Longdo Map search.

extendedType.name: extendedtype
extendedType.description:
Extended search type
Available valueDescription
findplacefromtext (default)Find place from text
textsearchText search

routeMode.name: mode
routeMode.description:
Search mode
Available valueDescription
t (default)Fastest route and avoid traffic congestions, with the real-time or predicted traffic condition (if time is specified)
cFastest route (disregarding traffic condition), return static travel time
dShortest route, return static travel time
eShortest route, return travel time with traffic condition

routeType.name: type
routeType.description:
Allow travel method (Can combine with bitwise OR)
Available valueDescription
1Road
8Ferry
16Tollway

routeRestrict.name: restrict
routeRestrict.description:
Vehicle restriction
Available valueDescription
0 (default)No restriction
1Don't use route that restrict motorcycle

spanFlag.name: flag
spanFlag.description:
Result type (Can combine with bitwise OR) (default: All)
Available valueDescription
1Road lines
2Boundary of span
